greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of von Klitzing constant R(K) (ohms).
comment: The value is exactly 5521725125000000000000/213914163877964163 = 25812.8074593... ohms, based on h/e^2 and their SI definitions. - _Ralf Steiner_, Dec 29 2018
2010 CODATA value was 25812.8074434(84) ohms; updated to 25812.8074555(59) ohms in the 2014 correction. (That is now obsolete. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 14 2019)
See the references in A322415. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Feb 11 2019
link: BIPM, On the revision of the International System of Units (SI), BIPM, Nov 13-16 2018.
results.author: _Arkadiusz Wesolowski_, Oct 07 2014
